column5: I put this video together with footage I shot last winter here in Northwestern Ontario.  Hope you like it!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O2kfA8V68gI&feature=plcp
Nice Ben! Let's hope for another year like that!
Awesome footage/compilation Ben, good tune as well.  Thanks for putting it together.
Looks like you had an awesome season last year. Great video, thanks for posting.
That was awesome. Damn I hope to catch some Lakers like that this winter.
Great video, really liked that shot of the hand reaching down for that monster pike
In what seems like a few short years Bennie, you've taken your fishing to an amazing place.  That vid gets ya pumped for ice fo' sho!!!  Good luck in 2013
Living the life!! Some incredible shots there my friend!
Nice, must've been a lot of fun! Loved the pike footage.
Great camera angles and of course, awesome fishing all around.
Business as usual
Well Done. Perfect tune also. Hope you get lots more this yr, looking forward to more vids of the fishing.
Great way to start the day!  Awesome video Ben
x2.  Some awesome photage!!
Great video, thanks for sharing. Now I hope to get some safe ice
Awesome video Ben!!  Great song choice too!!  Lets get a 40 inch laker this season!!
I could only watch half before getting too jealous!
Awesome vid with tons of beau-T lakers Ben. I'm pumped for ice now.

Thanks everyone.  I shot it with a GoPro and a Kodak PlaySport.  The PlaySport is relatively inexpensive, @ $179 and shoots 1080p HD and is fully submersible.  Also, it's small, about the size of an iPhone.
Nice Ben! Great way to get everyone pumped for the ice! I hope to get some videos this winter myself. I just started playing with a Gopro!  Good luck this season man!   TDunn
Thanks Tyler, you'll love the GoPro.  There's so much you can do with them.  I just started playing with the time-lapse mode.... looks awesome when you put it in a movie.  Have a great season.
Just dropped a massive hint about Go-pro to my wife
Thanx Ben, that vid is awesome!  I'd like to put a video together but I gotta catch some fish first!!
